typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDate as string,
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as short,
		UnitCost as double,
		Total as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull(toDate(OrderDate,'dd-mm-yyyy')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Badrows, Goodrows)
